headers.subject: Re: [Evolution] Exchange Connector still broken @ 2.6
headers.x-spam-status: No, score=-1.5 required=6.0 tests=AWL,BAYES_00 autolearn=unavailable version=3.1.9

body.para: On Thu, 2006-03-23 at 23:51 +0100, William John Murray wrote:

quote.quotepara: On Fri, 2006-03-24 at 10:37 +1200, Eustace, Glen wrote:

I tried upgrading to FC5 yesterday, one benefit I was hoping to see was to get the Evolution Connector working against Exchange again. It worked fine at 2.0, then after the upgrade to 2.2 it broke. I was waiting for 2.4 or 6 as I thought I had read that it had been fixed

body.para: I've not tested 2.6 yet. though I did test out 2.59 and it wasn't working. I have to downgrade from gnome-2.14 back to 2.12 cos of that.

quote.quotepara: The issue is that I can never authenticate. My windows userid is NOT my primary email address, the connector seems to assume that it should be. If I put in my user id, when prompted for my password, it uses my email alias instead.
I am in exactly your situation, and it works fine. You have separate fields for email address (identity tab) and username (receiving mail tab)

body.para: In Mine.. Receiving Email -> username : domain\windows_login_name OWA URL : http://ip_of_owa/exchange/email_id
eg: domain = mydom windows username = popeye email id = popeye.sailorman@exampledom.com
body.footer: -- Ow Mun Heng Gentoo/Linux on DELL D600 1.4Ghz 1.5GB RAM 98% Microsoft(tm) Free!! Neuromancer 11:50:11 up 4 days, 3:13, 2 users, load average: 0.73, 0.69, 0.54
